backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor as the backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature requirements, associated files, and components for the Valentine UI project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high-level summaries of main frontend components and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining theme colors, variables, and dark mode behavior.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app into the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component toggling between the Valentine prompt and success states with a footer.
Renders the Valentine question UI with a centered Yes button and an evasive No button that moves on interaction.
frontend/src/components/ValentineSuccess: Displays the success screen with romantic decorations and the meme image after acceptance.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages creating and refreshing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider with login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark romantic-themed UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, extended theme settings, plugins, and dark mode classes.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, requirements, and metadata for the romantic Valentine prompt application.
